title: BMW M2. It's Complicated But Fun -- TEST/DRIVE
description: This season, The Drive brought 11 of today's best performance cars to Thunderhill Raceway Park in Willows, CA for a group test and quick reviews. With contributors A.J. Baime, Matt Farah, Mike Guy, Mike Spinelli and Lawrence Ulrich.

asset.title: BMW M2. It's Complicated But Fun -- TEST/DRIVE
asset.description:
This season, The Drive brought 11 of today's best performance cars to Thunderhill Raceway Park in Willows, CA for a group test and quick reviews. With contributors A.J. Baime, Matt Farah, Mike Guy, Mike Spinelli and Lawrence Ulrich.

More at http://www.thedrive.com.
